channel.title: Making Duelzone

item.title: Making Duelzone
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

Okay Iâ€™m working on a Duel zone but I ran into a few problems. When I make the area a Duel zone, the wild status in the right hand corner keep switching from Duel! to Wild continusly. And then I need to make it so in the duel zone you do not loose anything and when you die you get teleported back to the area different than the normal death spawn point. Can someone help me. These are the codes I have so far else if(!DuelZone()) { sendQuest("Duel!", 15900); } public boolean DuelZone() { if(absX >= 5002 && absX<= 1972 && absY >= 5002 && absY <= 1972) return true; else return false; } if(DuelZone()) { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@whi@Duel!", 199); }

Read full topic
